t:test_case.t:objective: basic system check
Login to admin account
Modify a COS with valid id and valid values for all the attributes
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create the COS. 2. Modify it with value values for each of the attributes.

Modify a COS with zimbraPrefSaveToSent=TRUE and Override COS=FALSE
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create a COS. 2. Create an account with that COS. 3. Modify that COS with zimbraPrefSaveToSent=TRUE. 4. Get account info (The property Save to Sent should be TRUE).

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a COS with zimbraPrefSaveToSent=FALSE and Override COS=FALSE
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create a COS. 2. Create an account with that COS. 3. Modify that COS with zimbraPrefSaveToSent=FALSE 4. Get account info (The property Save to Sent should be FALSE).

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a COS with zimbraPrefSaveToSent=FALSE and Override COS=TRUE
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create a COS with zimbraPrefSaveToSent=TRUE. 2. Create an account with that COS with Override COS=TRUE and Save to Sent=TRUE. 3. Modify COS with zimbraPrefSaveToSent=FALSE. 4. Get account info (The property Save to Sent should be TRUE).

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a COS with zimbraPrefSaveToSent=TRUE and Override COS=TRUE
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create a COS with zimbraPrefSaveToSent=FALSE. 2. Create an account with that COS with Override COS=TRUE and Save to Sent=FALSE. 3. Modify COS with zimbraPrefSaveToSent=TRUE. 4. Get account info (The property Save to Sent should be FALSE).

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify a COS and set zimbraFeatureChangePasswordEnabled = TRUE/FALSE
